title.rendered: Schaeffler India’s impactful partnership with Smile Foundation

content.rendered:
Schaeffler India’s impactful partnership with Smile Foundation

Schaeffler India has partnered with Smile Foundation to bring primary healthcare services to underserved communities in Hosur of Tamil Nadu. This collaboration is designed to address the healthcare needs of those who often struggle to access quality medical care.

Through this agreement, Schaeffler India supports Smile Foundation’s mission by funding and facilitating primary health services for economically disadvantaged groups. The focus is on delivering timely and effective medical care.

By working together, Schaeffler India and Smile Foundation are making a tangible impact on the health and well-being of vulnerable populations, proving that strategic partnerships can drive significant positive change.
